title: Cannot open links in outlook emails after firefox re-install
content: Yesterday I was forced to update Firefox because of endless pop-ups telling me to. It would not update so, following Firefox support page advice I un-installed it and re-installed it. Now I cannot open any links in Outlook emails. I have changed the default to other browsers and cannot open links in any of them. I get the message "This operation has been cancelled due to restrictions in effect on this computer. Please contact your system administrator". I have found various references to this issue indicating that it is caused by leaving Firefox as default before uninstalling. It would have been helpful to know this first. I have tried all other solutions other than a registry edit which I am understandably nervous of. So now it appears that I have a permanently broken system thanks to Firefox forcing an update which I was happy to live without. I am on Windows 7 and yes, I know it is old and out of support for many things nowadays but the fact is it meets my needs and I had no reason to change. I have reset the default browser and uninstalled Firefox again but it is still broken. I tried a Microsoft fix which, without warning, forced me to upgrade to Microsoft Edge so my system which was just fine yesterday is apparently never going to be the same again. Can anyone tell me how to fix this?
creator: coopern1

title: menu content hover
content: After upgrading to FF110 , the former css code regarding highlighting items when hovering , works badly. So I wrote another one which works fine and suits my needs : menuitem { height: 23px; } menuitem:hover { background-height: 23px; background-color: rgba(204,204,204,0.8) !important; border-radius: 5px !important; cursor: pointer !important; -moz-appearance: none !important } Except for one thing , when I right click any where to get the menu , when I hover the horizontal items(go back , forward , bookmark ect..) they shift. The vertical hover works fine. Any ideas why? Thanks look4

title: General FF Use
content: Have been using FF for many years & each year run into various inconsistencies with the browser. Such as, not loading pics or videos on webpages, access to email is a daily challenge as to whether email page(s) will upload or not. Have tried several times to adjust what understand affects viewing pics/videos, but no changes. The email access is the most frustrating, as my email access will lock up or just not load. Even after clearing cache & restarting computer. Will have to go to another browser & email works fine & is very fast as not the case for FF. Maybe this is a computer issue, but other browsers work fine.

content: In the past week or two I've noticed that minimizing the browser and re-opening it after some time has passed(it's probably more than 5 minutes but haven't found the exact timing) -- the browser enters full screen mode (as if I've pressed f11). This happened in multiple websites so it seems unrelated to the website(although I did only try it in Netflix and YouTube so maybe something to do with videos?) My version of Firefox - 111.0b5

title: Clearing Cookies and Site Data on v110.0 64-bit for desktop Windows 10 22H2
content:
On the Privacy and Security section in Settings (Cookies and Site Data/Clear Data), I used to be able to Clear Cached Web Content but leave Cookies and Site Data unchecked to keep my cookies. Now, with v110.00 (64-bit), when I uncheck Cookies and Site Data, and choose only to clear Cached Web Content, all of my cookies get deleted anyway. Why is this happening?

Windows 10 Home, 22H2 Firefox 110.0 64-bit "Delete Cookies and Site Data when Firefox is closed" is unchecked. I made no changes to settings when I updated to v110.0 It was fine before the update to v110.0
creator: kduncan5

title: 503 error means I can't access Uniprot database
content:
So, I need to use the website Uniprot regularly for my course this semester - a website which acts primarily as a protein database. However, when I try to search for anything using my copy of Firefox, I get a 503 error message as photographed below. I would assume this was a problem with the server, not my copy of Firefox, except that I get the requested results:

  • On other browsers
  • On copies of Firefox on other computers
  • When I go into Private Browing on my copy of Firefox
  • When I hard-refresh the page (Shift + Refresh) on my own regular Firefox

For reference, I have left an image of how the website should look below as well. This is quite annoying as I need to use this for my college work and Firefox is my browser of choice, plus I have noticed similar issues when accessing other databases (E.g.: NCBI). I have tried disabling/deleting all my extensions, refreshing Firefox to default, clearing my cache and cookies, and going so far as to completely uninstall Firefox and delete its files on my computer and re-download it, and nothing seems to be working. I am at my wits end and would appreciate any help anyone can give. Thank you.

This is the website in question: https://www.uniprot.org/
creator: colmmryan

title: Synced tabs from other device are missing but still present in about:sync
content:
I have a remote device previously connected and synced (everything with tabs). That remote device is showing up in my devices list on the account management web page (https://accounts.firefox.com/settings).

But Firefox doesn't show the remote device and its tabs, neither in hamburger menu, nor in the sidebar, nor in Cloud Tabs button. But that remote device and all its tabs is still present in about:sync. I was able to export all ~300 tabs with some hackery.

My question is why I can't see that device and its tabs the normal way?

I have Sync properly enabled because it shows me some other irrelevant device and its tabs. I use last Firefox 110.

title: Fingerprint-reader does nor work login into Ebay
content:
Hi

Some days ago logging in to Ebay with one of my Android devices, and I got the possibility to change to fingerprint authenticaton. Works fine, but when logging in on my Windows/desktop Lenovo Ideapad C-230 with ringerprint-reader (Goodix) I did not get this possibility. When I experience problems in Firefox I try the same in Chrome and Edge, and with those readers the fingerprint authentication worked! So we can conclude that it's something with Firefox in this instance. I have also tried in Troubleshooting-mode with no positive result. I use WIndows 11 Home 22H2 and Firefox 110.0 (64).

Hoping for some useful feedback.

Regards Øyvind

title: 4K Youtube videos choppy and stutter on full screen mode.
content:
Hello,

I would like to ask your help. I have a LG 27UK850N 4K monitor, and if i play youtube 4K video on full screen mode it's a little bit choppy and stutter. Looks like dropping frame sometime but it does not. If i try with another browsers (chrome, edge, brave) videos are smoother than firefox. Just only on full screen.

i am experiencing this on Windows and macOS too if i connect my macbook. I have bought Youtube premium so i do not use adblocking on this site etc and i tried firefox without extensions too.

Technical details:

Latest Firefox version (110.0) Extensions: - Bitwarden - Adguard - Return Youtube Dislike

macOS: Macbook Air M1 base modell (8/256), Monterey 12.6.3

Windows PC: Latest Windows 10 with all updates Nvidia Geforce RTX 3060 Ti Intel i5 12400 32GB of RAM

Do you have any suggestion to solve this issue? Without disabling hardware acceleration (it is important function for me).

Thank you in advance and sorry for my simple english. I wonder i could expression myself in right way and you can understand. :)

Regards, Tibor
creator: panak.tibor

title: MetaMask Extension Auto Login
content:
When I first installed MetaMask Extension, the "Remember Login" feature in FF worked great.

A while back FF had a nasty crash. I had to recover my MetaMask account using the Recovery Phrase, and re-enter all my crypto tokens manually into it.

However, I haven't found any way of reinstating the "Remember Login" feature for the MetaMask extension. It still works AOK for all my other logins, it seems to be just because this is an extension.

Is there any way to force the MM extension to use "Remember Login"?
